text: Bulgaria competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne, Australia and Stockholm, Sweden (equestrian events). ==Medalists== === Gold=== * Nikola Stanchev -- Wrestling, Men's Freestyle Middleweight === Silver=== * Dimitar Dobrev -- Wrestling, Men's Greco-Roman Middleweight * Petko Sirakov -- Wrestling, Men's Greco-Roman Light Heavyweight * Yusein Mekhmedov -- Wrestling, Men's Freestyle Heavyweight === Bronze=== * Stefan Bozhkov, Todor Diev, Georgi Dimitrov, Milcho Goranov, Ivan Petkov Kolev, Nikola Kovachev, Manol Manolov, Dimitar Milanov, Georgi Naydenov, Panayot Panayotov, Kiril Rakarov, Gavril Stoyanov, Krum Yanev, and Yosif Yosifov -- Football (soccer), Men's Team Competition ==Basketball== ===Preliminary round=== ===Group C=== {| class="wikitable"
